meanings: maneuver from behind the scenes[in the background]

examples.korean: The plane was piloted by the instructor. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 비행기는 교관이 조종했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He radioed the pilot to change course. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 조종사에게 항로를 바꾸라는 무선을 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The pilot was able to parachute to safety. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 조종사는 낙하산으로 안전히 뛰어내릴 수 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The Abbey bell tolled for those killed in the war. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 애비 사원의 종이 전몰자들을 위한 조종을 울렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
